capability: {\"name\":\"Mathdroid COVID-19 API\",\"url\":\"://covid19.mathdro.id/api\",\"description\":\"The Mathdroid COVID-19 API is serving data from the Center for Systems Science and Engineering at John Hopkins University to visualize and track reported cases in real-time.\",\"source\":\"Johns Hopkins University CSSE\",\"contentType\":[\"Health\"],\"homePage\":\"https://github.com/mathdroid/covid-19-api\",\"thumbnail\":\"https://systems.jhu.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/csse-horizontal-white-1024x279.png\",\"coverage\":[\"Global\"],\"format\":[\"JSON\"],\"updates\":[\"Daily\"]}"
